SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Applicant
Represents an Applicant in the BTO Management System.
Application
Represents an application for a BTO project by an applicant.
ApplicationManager
Manages applications for BTO projects, including creating, retrieving, approving, and withdrawing applications.
ApplicationStatus
Represents the status of a BTO application throughout its lifecycle.
BTOManagementSystem
Command-line interface for the Build-To-Order (BTO) Management System.
Enquiry
Represents a user enquiry about a specific BTO project.
EnquiryManager
Manages user enquiries for BTO projects, including persistence and retrieval.
FileHandler
Easy reference to read/write functions
FilterSettings
Represents user-defined filters for viewing BTO projects.
FlatType
Types of flats available for BTO application.
FormatChecker
Utility class for validating user input formats.
HDBManager
Represents an HDB Manager in the BTO Management System.
HDBOfficer
Represents an HDB Officer in the BTO Management System.
IApplicationManager
Manages BTO application operations, including loading/saving, creating, approving, rejecting, booking, receipt handling, and reporting.
IEnquiryManager
Manages user enquiries for BTO projects, including persistence and retrieval.
IFileHandler
Handles generic file read and write operations.
IProjectManager
Manages BTO project operations including retrieval, filtering, and modifications by HDB Managers and viewing by users.
IProjectRegistration
Handles HDB Officer registration workflows for projects.
IUserManager
Manages user authentication, session, and user data operations.
main
Entry point for the BTO Management application.
MaritalStatus
Marital status of an applicant, each with its own eligibility rule for viewing certain flat types at a given age.
Project
Represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) project, including its name, neighbourhood, available flat supply, application date window, visibility status, and assigned HDB Officers.
ProjectManager
Manages creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, and filtering of Project instances.
ProjectRegistration
Implements officer registration workflows for BTO projects.
RegistrationForm
Represents an HDB Officer's registration request for a BTO project.
setUpFactory
Factory class to create and configure a fully initialized instance of the BTOManagementSystem.
User
Abstract base class for all system users (Applicants, Officers, Managers).
UserManager
Manages user authentication, loading from CSV, and password updates.
